OOGI.summary: As of June 9, 2011, C2E Energy, Inc. was acquired by Yorkshire Energy Holding and Yorkshire Trading, in a reverse merger transaction. Odyssey Oil & Energy, Inc. designs, builds, and operates coal to energy/coal to liquid plants based on its zero emission technology. It produces petrol, diesel, fuel oil, and aviation fuel products. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Fourways, South Africa.
